topSection.me: I'm Julia, nice to have you here.
topSection.IDo: I do <link1>UX & UI design</link1> with a developer background and I'm a passionate <link2>artist</link2>.

section.title: UX & UI Design
section.content: I do UX and UI design to make applications more usable and look friendlier. In addition, I have background knowledge of software development, which simplifies the planning and implementation of new interaction concepts and interfaces.

section.title: Fine Art - Shapes and colors
section.content: My art focuses on colors and shapes mostly created with acrylics and watercolors. I travel a lot and paint in nature, so I also like to use materials from the environment, such as sand and leaves.

exhibitions.title: Exhibitions
exhibitions.content: I exhibited for the first time as part of <link1>Kunst aus vielen HÃ¤nden</link1>. I find the exchange with other artists and people interested in art very exciting, so I am already looking forward to the next opportunity to exhibit.
exhibitions.KaterMurr: The next exhibition will begin on March 21, 2023 at Kater Murr in Nuremberg during the opening hours of the bar. The pictures will then remain hanging for a few weeks. I am very happy about your visit.

section.title: Digital Art, Illustrations & Monster
section.content: In the field of digital design, I develop fonts, logos and illustrations. I prefer to work with Sketchbook and Procreate. Among the illustrations, I particularly liked the monsters, which has resulted in a small collection over time: 'Monsters for every situation'.
